amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund for a Comprehensive Entitlement Reform Commission.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3127 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3127 proposed by Senator Hagel. (consideration: CR S2252-2253, S2260; text: CR S2252) To establish a reserve fund for a Comprehensive Entitlement Reform Commission.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3127 proposed by Senator Hagel.
